name: cash_flow_statement
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fmpcloud.
Tool description: Access stock prices. Financial statements, real stock price values. SEC EDGAR API with all filings in real time. Free stock API to discover financial data instantly more at https://fmpcloud.io/ 
API description: Retrieves the cash flow statement for a given stock in JSON format.

stock.description: The stock symbol to retrieve the cash flow statement for.

period.description: The period of the statement, either 'quarter' or 'annual'. Defaults to 'quarter'.
